This game is full of hackers, if you start out new, your first comp game will be full of hackers that you can see hacking as you get more into the game and users have badges but they are still hacking but only using wall hacks or rage aim hacking if it is a close comp match. I have over 2000 wins in comp, and only 5 percent of those games were hack free. Steam really does not seem to care, trusted mode only produced more hackers that i saw.
